item.title: Brian add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Brian add a quote by John Green
item.description: "…because nerds like us are allowed to be unironically enthusiastic about stuff… Nerds are allowed to love stuff, like jump-up-and-down-in-the-chair-can’t-control-yourself love it. Hank, when people call people nerds, mostly what they’re saying is ‘you like stuff.’ Which is just not a good insult at all. Like, ‘you are too enthusiastic about the miracle of human consciousness’." -- John Green

item.title: Brian add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "The deadliest bullshit is odorless, and transparent." -- William Gibson

item.title: Brian add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead channel." -- William Gibson

item.title: Brian add a quote by William Gibson
item.description:
"The future is already here – it's just not evenly distributed.
<i>The Economist, December 4, 2003</i>" -- William Gibson

item.title: Brian add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "And, for an instant, she stared directly into those soft blue eyes and knew, with an instinctive mammalian certainty, that the exceedingly rich were no longer even remotely human." -- William Gibson

item.title: Brian add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "Secrets...are the very root of cool." -- William Gibson

item.title: Brian add a quote by Herman Melville
item.description: "Better to sleep with a sober cannibal than a drunk Christian." -- Herman Melville
